# anchored(in:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a modified `CoordinateSpace3D` offset to match the provided `anchorPoint` in the original coordinate space.

## Declaration

```swift
func anchored(in anchorPoint: UnitPoint3D) -> some CoordinateSpace3D

```
title: anchored(in:)
